content.newsInsight: UK just announced they're cutting 40,000 NHS jobs while approving a billion pound severance package. Everyone's screaming about healthcare collapse. We see something else. When you fire that many people at once, you're not cutting fat. You're building something new.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: The NHS job cuts, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: what AI system needs exactly 40,000 fewer humans to run healthcare, and which tech giant just got their pilot program approved?
content.consultingInsight: We were just reading how McKinsey helps healthcare systems optimize workforce efficiency through their legendary transformation playbooks. Decades of expertise distilled into proven frameworks. But what if that level of strategic insight wasn't locked behind seven figure contracts? What if every healthcare startup could tap into it?
